name: Create Demio registration for an event from Google Sheets
description: Every time a new row is added in Google Sheets, Make will automatically create a registration for an event in Demio. This example uses [this sheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1I_0ORbuaKUyehO5qj7l3iWRNYELfAuG5lQzLfyuSw9A/edit#gid=0).
